column4: gnome has some session management features.. but people often complain about them since they are not used to such a thing under windows.
well it's not for permanent autostart, just something like say, starting "project 1 session" will open all the folders i had open in that session etc.
ive seen similer features. but i never use them
i guess i could set up the different directories on the different screens, and just switch between them. when i shutdown, the state of  all screens would be stored right?
